title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs. ... Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank.

title: Matteo Patrone
snippet: He has overall responsibility for the effective delivery of EBRD investments and advisory activities in the Bankâ€™s countries of operation, in addition to contributing to the delivery of EBRD policy engagement activities.

title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: Prior to working at the EBRD, Mr Patrone was Managing Director of the private equity arm of Finanziaria Internazionale, an Italian merchant bank, where he spent 10 years investing in a broad range of sectors.

title: President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the President of the EBRD, an office she has held since 2020.

title: EBRD: staff, structure, history
snippet: The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, as well as the European Union and the European Investment Bank. Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.
